code: import _toConsumableArray from"C:/Users/nguye/Desktop/client/node_modules/babel-preset-react-app/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray";import{GET_BLOGS_CATEGORY_ID}from'../types/blogType';var blogsCategoryReducer=function blogsCategoryReducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case GET_BLOGS_CATEGORY_ID:if(state.every(function(item){return item.id!==action.payload.id;})){return[].concat(_toConsumableArray(state),[action.payload]);}else{return state.map(function(blog){return blog.id===action.payload.id?action.payload:blog;});}default:return state;}};export default blogsCategoryReducer;
